id.description: Unique identifier for the location (Provided by application)

name.description: Name of the wilderness area (e.g., Shadowfen Mire, Frostpeak Mountains)

description.description: Overall description of the area's environment, climate, and general atmosphere

parentLocationId.description: ID of the parent location (e.g., Region ID, provided by application)

typicalOccupants.description: Free-form description of common wildlife, monsters, or infrequent travelers.

terrain.description: Dominant terrain type (e.g., Forest, Swamp, Mountain, Desert)

dangers.description: Description of common environmental hazards or hostile creatures

hinting_at.description: What secret, plot hook, or information this POI might reveal
